action.des: Pitching Change: Shane Loux replaces Jeremy Affeldt.

atbat.des: Jemile Weeks lines out to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
atbat.des_es: Jemile Weeks batea línea de out a jardinero izquierdo Melky Cabrera.

pitch.cc: Shane Loux may prefer to go after Jemile Weeks, whose OPS is .617 this season, with the changeup rather than facing Josh Reddick, whose OPS is .846.

atbat.des: Josh Reddick singles on a ground ball to third baseman Pablo Sandoval.
atbat.des_es: Josh Reddick pega sencillo con rodado a tercera base Pablo Sandoval.

action.des: With Jonny Gomes batting, Josh Reddick advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.

atbat.des_es: Jonny Gomes recibe base por bolas.

pitch.cc: Shane Loux is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.

action.des: Pitching Change: Santiago Casilla replaces Shane Loux.
